channel.title: R00t Field Phrases
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "R00t Field Phrases" - I want to make a list of all the phrases used in field descriptions. For example, "You leave a trail in the air behind you, a ghostly figure that leaves a record of your every movement" is one

item.title: Re: R00t Field Phrases
item.content:encoded: The sun is high in the sky, casting stark shadows.

item.title: Re: R00t Field Phrases
item.content:encoded: The landscape is dominated by a giant, ebony tower.

item.title: R00t Field Phrases
item.content:encoded:
This is what I have so far:
-All color is bleached from the world, leaving it black and white.
-The underbrush crumbles to dust as you touch it.
-You leave a trail in the air behind you, a ghostly figure that leaves a record of your every movement.
-Every sound echoes for minutes in the ghastly silence.
-A snowy blizzard obscures all detail.
-The ground is featureless, extending into infinity.
